content:
[
  {
    "problem": "Lack of time to research and stay updated on environmental topics",
    "importance": 4,
    "required_expertise": 2,
    "no_code_solution": "An email newsletter where users can subscribe and receive weekly updates and news about environmental topics",
    "content_solution": "A comprehensive online course that covers environmental topics from basic concepts to advanced practices",
    "competitors": "Udemy, Coursera, LinkedIn Learning",
    "differentiator": "Our course will focus exclusively on environmentally concerned individuals and will provide practical tips and strategies for everyday life"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Difficulty in finding credible and reliable sources of environmental information",
    "importance": 5,
    "required_expertise": 2,
    "no_code_solution": "A curated list of credible and reliable environmental sources, available for free on our website",
    "content_solution": "A video series that features experts in the environmental field, discussing various topics and answering common questions",
    "competitors": "Greenpeace, The Nature Conservancy, World Wildlife Fund",
    "differentiator": "Our content will be easily accessible and tailored to a general audience, with a focus on providing practical advice and resources"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Difficulty in implementing sustainable practices in everyday life",
    "importance": 4,
    "required_expertise": 3,
    "no_code_solution": "A mobile app that provides users with personalized sustainability plans based on their lifestyle habits and preferences",
    "content_solution": "A series of e-books that provide practical tips and strategies for implementing sustainable practices in different areas of life (home, work, travel, etc.)",
    "competitors": "Ecosia, JouleBug, Oroeco",
    "differentiator": "Our app and e-books will be tailored to individual users, taking into account their specific habits and preferences"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Lack of community and support for environmentally concerned individuals",
    "importance": 3,
    "required_expertise": 2,
    "no_code_solution": "A social media platform for environmentally concerned individuals to connect, share resources, and support each other",
    "content_solution": "A podcast series featuring interviews with environmentally concerned individuals and experts, discussing various topics and sharing stories and experiences",
    "competitors": "Ecovative Design, TerraCycle, The Climate Group",
    "differentiator": "Our platform and podcast will be exclusively focused on environmentally concerned individuals, providing a safe and supportive community for like-minded individuals"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Lack of knowledge on how to make a positive impact on the environment",
    "importance": 5,
    "required_expertise": 2,
    "no_code_solution": "A chatbot that provides users with personalized advice and tips on how to make a positive impact on the environment",
    "content_solution": "A series of online workshops that provide practical tips and strategies for making a positive impact on the environment, hosted by experts in the field",
    "competitors": "Greenpeace, The Nature Conservancy, World Wildlife Fund",
    "differentiator": "Our chatbot and workshops will be tailored to individual users, taking into account their specific interests and goals"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Lack of access to affordable and sustainable products",
    "importance": 4,
    "required_expertise": 3,
    "no_code_solution": "An online marketplace that connects environmentally concerned individuals with affordable and sustainable products",
    "content_solution": "A blog that provides reviews and recommendations for affordable and sustainable products in different categories (food, clothing, home, etc.)",
    "competitors": "Etsy, Thrive Market, Package Free",
    "differentiator": "Our marketplace and blog will focus exclusively on affordable and sustainable products, making it easier for environmentally concerned individuals to make informed choices"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Lack of information on local environmental issues",
    "importance": 4,
    "required_expertise": 2,
    "no_code_solution": "An interactive map that provides users with information on local environmental issues and events",
    "content_solution": "A newsletter that provides updates and news on local environmental issues and events",
    "competitors": "Greenpeace, The Nature Conservancy, World Wildlife Fund",
    "differentiator": "Our map and newsletter will focus exclusively on local issues, making it easier for users to get involved and make a positive impact in their own communities"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Lack of knowledge on how to reduce carbon footprint",
    "importance": 5,
    "required_expertise": 2,
    "no_code_solution": "A carbon footprint calculator that provides users with personalized advice and tips on how to reduce their carbon footprint",
    "content_solution": "A video series that provides practical tips and strategies for reducing carbon footprint in different areas of life (home, work, travel, etc.)",
    "competitors": "Carbonfootprint.com, MyClimate",
    "differentiator": "Our calculator and video series will be tailored to individual users, taking into account their specific habits and preferences"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Lack of motivation and accountability when it comes to sustainable practices",
    "importance": 3,
    "required_expertise": 2,
    "no_code_solution": "A gamified app that provides users with challenges and rewards for implementing sustainable practices in everyday life",
    "content_solution": "A blog that features success stories and inspiring examples of individuals and businesses that have successfully implemented sustainable practices",
    "competitors": "Ecosia, Oroeco, JouleBug",
    "differentiator": "Our app and blog will focus on gamification and positive reinforcement, making sustainable practices more fun and motivating for users"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Lack of access to academic resources on environmental topics",
    "importance": 4,
    "required_expertise": 5,
    "no_code_solution": "An online library of academic articles and research papers on environmental topics, available for subscription",
    "content_solution": "An online course that provides an overview of academic research on environmental topics, hosted by experts in the field",
    "competitors": "JSTOR, ScienceDirect",
    "differentiator": "Our library and course will be focused exclusively on environmental topics, providing easy and affordable access to academic resources for environmentally concerned individuals"
  }
]
